Description:
This web service retrieves a single condition (diagnosis) from a patient's chart. This includes any data found in the patient's diagnoses across all encounters. This resource can be queried by a combination of patient ID and status. This resource can also return an encounter-level diagnosis.

A user or staff member accessing this FHIR resource must have security to have Problem List Item details included in the Condition resource.
SampleResponse:
<Condition xmlns="http://hl7.org/fhir">

<id value="e7ijxUCtjzFLHvDFSIqXu2w3" />

<clinicalStatus>

<coding>

<system value="http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/condition-clinical" />

<code value="active" />

<display value="Active" />

</coding>

<text value="Active" />

</clinicalStatus>

<verificationStatus>

<coding>

<system value="http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/condition-ver-status" />

<code value="confirmed" />

<display value="Confirmed" />

</coding>

<text value="Confirmed" />

</verificationStatus>

<category>

<coding>

<system value="http://hl7.org/fhir/condition-category" />

<code value="problem-list-item" />

<display value="Problem List Item" />

</coding>

<text value="Problem List Item" />

</category>

<code>

<coding>

<system value="urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.90" />

<code value="L60.0" />

</coding>

<coding>

<system value="urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" />

<code value="400097005" />

</coding>

<text value="Ingrowing nail" />

</code>

<subject>

<reference value="Patient/ej4nFxzySJAysjMuv4rTBNA3" />

<display value="Lufhir, Meiko H Jr., MD" />

</subject>

<recordedDate value="2018-11" />

</Condition>

ID.Name: ID
ID.Description: FHIR identifier for the target Condition resource.

Condition.Name: Condition
Condition.Description: An instance of the R4 Condition resource.

clinicalStatus.Name: clinicalStatus
clinicalStatus.Description: The clinical status, which can be active, resolved, or inactive.
clinicalStatus.Optional: This element can be returned for visit diagnoses (but not admissions or discharges).

code.Name: code
code.Description: External codings for the condition. If a list of codes is sent, they're listed in this element. Otherwise, this element uses the problem name from the name element.

encounter.Name: encounter
encounter.Description: Reference to an Encounter resource that the diagnosis is asserted.

subject.Name: subject
subject.Description: The patient associated with the condition.

verificationStatus.Name: verificationStatus
verificationStatus.Description: If this is on the patient's local chart, the value is "confirmed". If it is outside data, it is "unconfirmed".
